2 2/1/2019 Fri Annual Heart & Healthy "Go Red" Event 7:00 PM 10:00 PM Hackensack Performing Arts Center 102 State St., Hackensack, NJ 07601 The National Coalition of 100 Black Women, Inc. Bergen/Passaic Chapter Ketsia A. Sadler, EdD (201) 527-0229 $10/ticket Help us celebrate our 10th yr of commemorating "Go Red Day" as we help fight heart disease in women. Light refreshments, vendors, health information & wine tasting. Come ready to make a donation in honor of a loved one to the American Heart Association. 4 2/9/2019 Sat Black History Festival & Health Fair 10:00 AM 2:00 PM Holy Name Medical Center - Marian Hall Holy Name Medical Center (201) 833-3336 free In recognition of Black History Month, Holy Name Medical Center will be hosting a day of screenings and seminars designed to help you achieve wellness. Screenings will include blood work, blood pressure, BMI, bone density, vein screening, diabetic risk assessment and medication review. Join us for a day of health, food, music and art! Live music provided by Reggie Pittman & NYC Love & Soul Band https://www.holyname.org/BlackHistoryFair/ Yes Sat 2/9/2019 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM | Black History Festival & Health Fair | Holy Name Medical Center - Marian Hall | In recognition of Black History Month, Holy Name Medical Center will be hosting a day of screenings and seminars designed to help you achieve wellness. Bergen/Passaic Chapter (201) 287-9600 free Come and meet alumni from various HBCU's during an in depth discussion about the advantages of attending historically black colleges and universities.
